content.rendered:
beauty bar in bedford | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar on yonge + lawrence, toronto. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in bedford | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 936 bedford highway, unit 105
  • 902-407-5707
  • bedford@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon.: 11:00 am – 8:00 pm

tue. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat.: 9:00 am – 5:00 pm

sun.: closed

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

Moe made me feel very comfortable for my first wax ever, and I have already returned for another! 10/10 would recommend.
Laura Eamon
1720201305
My first experience with The Ten Spot, a pedicure with Moe, will not be my last. Moe is friendly and thorough, and a pleasure to chat with. Thank you Moe! 🙂
Taylor Blaikie
1718458590
Great experience, would recommend. Lots of colors to choose from for pedi's or manicures. Very relaxing, super clean salon. Friendly staff and very professional.
Pam Maloney
1715274150
I had a great experience at The Ten Spot. The esthetician who performed my service was skilled, as well as friendly and welcoming.
MK
1713896498
Such a great experience with Moe at The Ten Spot ! Had a Brazilian Wax done and she was so kind, thorough and fast! 100% recommend 😊
Dana Smith
1713015184
I had a wax service which was perfect as well as a wonderful pedicure. Everything was so professionally done with Moe! She was very friendly and administered both of the services very well and effectively! Super pleased with my time at the Ten... Spot!!!read more
Maureen Grant
1712869353
I had a great experience with the waxing services with Kailen. They made time for me the same day I was leaving for Cuba. I highly recommend! I will be going back.
Tiana Holbrough
1706969796
I had a French pedicure today with Reanne. Her space was clean and organized and she did an outstanding job. I recommend Reanne at Ten Spot Bedford if you want a beautiful pedicure experience done by a friendly professional!
mail272
1705711807
I always come here for a fresh arm wax. The specialty wax they use interacts so well with my skin. Professional service every visit! I would highly recommend to anyone who needs waxing services.
Cassondra Mitchell
1704908708
Had the best experience from booking to final product. Very comfortable atmosphere, All the staff were very pleasant and welcoming. The two estheticians that completed me and my friends' Pedicures were personable and did an absolute amazing job: my... friend and I left very happy and felt great about the whole experience.Highly recommend The Ten Spot and can not wait to rebook soon.read more
Hannah Gwendolyn
1692061496
‹
›
